description: A schema for Shopify theme translation files. Supports nested properties, pluralized translations, and translations containing HTML.

.*_html$.description: Translation string that contains HTML. The '_html' suffix prevents the HTML content from being escaped.

few.description: Translation for 'few' form, used in some languages

many.description: Translation for 'many' form, used in some languages

two.description: Translation for 'two' form, used in some languages

zero.description: Translation for 'zero' form, used in some languages

pluralizedString.description: An object representing a pluralized translation string
